headline.0: Mean Toddlers: Preventing Mean Girls From Developing in the Earliest Years
headline.1: A Woman Told Her Boss About A Devastating Cancer Diagnosis. He Responded By Firing Her.

short_description.0: What if girls were taught to deal appropriately with jealousy long before they ever get to middle school? As a scholar in child development (and thus, a lifelong student of human behavior), I believe they should be. It could have great payoffs later in life for girls and women.

authors.0: Katherine Rose, ContributorAssociate Professor in Early Child Development and Education a...
